meanings.sent1: The multistoried building had many floors for people to live on.
meanings.sent2: The hotel was a multistoried structure with elevators to reach each level.
meanings.sent3: The multistoried house made it challenging for the cat to climb up to the top floor.
meanings.sent4: Her multistoried cake was a towering masterpiece at the bake sale.
meanings.sent5: The multistoried treehouse in the backyard was the envy of all the neighborhood kids.

meanings.definition: Consisting of multiple stories or levels.
meanings.sent1: The multistoried apartment complex provided housing for many families.
meanings.sent2: The office building was a multistoried structure with different departments on each floor.
meanings.sent3: The multistoried sandwich was so tall that it was hard to take a bite.
meanings.sent4: Her multistoried hairdo was the talk of the party, towering above everyone else.
meanings.sent5: The multistoried bookshelf in the library held a vast collection of books on various levels.
